body_html: Great, they have to write an essay? I would definitively want to share that with my teamie, so I don't see the need to hide that from eachother. 1) I would reckon: IF we write non-compatible opinions, that would hamper our chances to get in. 2) If we indeed HAVE uncompatible opinions, we better know that before than during summer.

body: Great, they have to write an essay? I would definitively want to share that with my teamie, so I don't see the need to hide that from eachother. 1) I would reckon: IF we write non-compatible opinions, that would hamper our chances to get in. 2) If we indeed HAVE uncompatible opinions, we better know that before than during summer.
